channel.title: 2Speced Reborn
channel.description:
[center]Hello, my name is Mike, but also known as Bossmous/Boss/Ven0mous/Ven0m. CLIENT DOWNLOAD LINK: http://www.mediafire.com/?sl4r79ec1e8h890 I've been working on a project for some time now and I think it's time to make a development thread.
Basically what this project is is a remake of "2Speced". 2Speced was a private server which was very popular 1-3 years ago, and people loved it. Then we got better sources and better coders so it wasn't that impressive anymore, so it went down.
What I've done, is took one of the better sources, and "converted" it into the old 2Speced source, atleast, that is my goal.
Deob: 317 Base: Project Insanity
Green = Finished, orange = Started, red = Planned, but not started
[b][size=18pt]Combat[/size][/b] [img]http://www.runescapeaccountsfree.com/images/warriors.gif[/img] Followed Melee Followed Range Followed Magic Timers Level requirements Correct hit formulas Autocasting <- Needs some tweaking, it works though.
[b][size=18pt]Teleport system[/size][/b] [img]http://img707.imageshack.us/img707/9474/clip0011.gif[/img] Timers The same teleport system 2Speced had <- Locations, nothing more :)
You get money by teleporting to Ape Atoll and craft uncut gems into amulets, then selling them to the general store etc.
I plan on releasing this project fairly soon, as a Beta stage, so I purchased a VPS today.
4GB Ram 90/70 mbit download/upload speed 30GB HDD Located in Sweden Linux OS
As we get more players, the VPS specs will expand, that is good for about 100 players though.
Development team; Mike -Empty
We do not yet have a website, I am seeking a person who is able to develop one, will be awarded with in-game Administrator rights.
Thank you for reading my thread, and I hope most of you guys will like it. [/center]

item.title: 2Speced Reborn
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

There are way better sources to use so why do people continue to use Pi and Delta. Well I can see Delta but not Pi.

Read full topic

item.title: 2Speced Reborn
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Delta was just an heavily modified Czar, which was a blank base back then with basic player rendering etc.

Read full topic

item.title: 2Speced Reborn
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

badger41:

People think delta was super bad, it was actually pretty stable, compared to all the damn memory leaks, deadlocks, and dupes that your run of the mill pi server has

Delta was okay if it had a decent owner who actually new Java. If I downloaded one of the hundreds of delta releases I would find 100s of dead code fragments. People go with the majority and the majority of deltas sucked.

Read full topic

item.title: 2Speced Reborn
item.dc:creator: @Bossmous Bossmous
item.description:
@Bossmous wrote:

[center]Hello, my name is Mike, but also known as Bossmous/Boss/Ven0mous/Ven0m.
CLIENT DOWNLOAD LINK: http://www.mediafire.com/?sl4r79ec1e8h890
I’ve been working on a project for some time now and I think it’s time to make a development thread.

Basically what this project is is a remake of “2Speced”. 2Speced was a private server which was very popular 1-3 years ago, and people loved it. Then we got better sources and better coders so it wasn’t that impressive anymore, so it went down.

What I’ve done, is took one of the better sources, and “converted” it into the old 2Speced source, atleast, that is my goal.

Deob: 317
Base: Project Insanity

Green = Finished, orange = Started, red = Planned, but not started

[size=18pt]Combat[/size]

Followed Melee
Followed Range
Followed Magic
Timers
Level requirements
Correct hit formulas
Autocasting <- Needs some tweaking, it works though.

[size=18pt]Teleport system[/size]

Timers
The same teleport system 2Speced had <- Locations, nothing more

You get money by teleporting to Ape Atoll and craft uncut gems into amulets, then selling them to the general store etc.

I plan on releasing this project fairly soon, as a Beta stage, so I purchased a VPS today.

4GB Ram
90/70 mbit download/upload speed
30GB HDD
Located in Sweden
Linux OS

As we get more players, the VPS specs will expand, that is good for about 100 players though.

Development team;
Mike
-Empty

We do not yet have a website, I am seeking a person who is able to develop one, will be awarded with in-game Administrator rights.

Thank you for reading my thread, and I hope most of you guys will like it.
[/center]

Read full topic
